item.title: Go Escape
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Go Escape is a skillful and brain relaxation game in fact. If you just tap to start without any thoughts about the rational path, you are hardly able to pass the latter levels. So if you want to pass every latter level like first one, please plan a route before loosing the organ device. Show […]
item.content:encoded:
Go Escape is a skillful and brain relaxation game in fact. If you just tap to start without any thoughts about the rational path, you are hardly able to pass the latter levels. So if you want to pass every latter level like first one, please plan a route before loosing the organ device. Show me your perfact route choice and subtle operation!
Use the mouse or your finger to play.

item.title: AMAZE
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Amaze is another drawing game with relaxing gameplay and a few skills. The only goal in each level is to fill in all blank positions with your ball. Unfortunately, you are forbidded to make any curve pathes. Have fun playing with simple operation and gradient difficulty.Use mouse or tap to play.
item.content:encoded:
Amaze is another drawing game with relaxing gameplay and a few skills. The only goal in each level is to fill in all blank positions with your ball. Unfortunately, you are forbidded to make any curve pathes. Have fun playing with simple operation and gradient difficulty.
Use mouse or tap to play.

item.title: Light It Up
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Light It Up is an arcade game with both puzzle elements and special operation skills. As a player who is ready to challenge himself should know how to balance collecting stars and complete the current level. All the harder levels are forcing players to make a choise. The game itself has limited difficulty thanks to […]
item.content:encoded:
Light It Up is an arcade game with both puzzle elements and special operation skills. As a player who is ready to challenge himself should know how to balance collecting stars and complete the current level. All the harder levels are forcing players to make a choise. The game itself has limited difficulty thanks to the path you choose.
Use mouse or tap to play.

item.title: Going Balls Run
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Going Balls Run is an arcade ball game. Control the ball to roll fast, boost speed, keep your balance, and don’t fall off the platform. If you are looking for the best Rollerball game, this game is your best choice.PCMouse click and drag to move, hold to speed upMobileTap and slide to move, hold to […]
item.content:encoded:
Going Balls Run is an arcade ball game. Control the ball to roll fast, boost speed, keep your balance, and don’t fall off the platform. If you are looking for the best Rollerball game, this game is your best choice.
PCMouse click and drag to move, hold to speed upMobileTap and slide to move, hold to speed up
